sentences.english: I don't think that the Hakka transliteration is exactly right.

sentences.english: Hakka is one of the languages that were brought over from China.

sentences.english: In Hakha dialect, it means chickens prepared in salt.
sentences.chinese: 客家話的意思就是用鹽經過特殊加工而做成的。
